title: Duplicate gloo in thirdparty and caffe2/contrib/gloo
body_html:
🐛 Failed compiling of the current master branch

So, which gloo should we use? The one in caffe2 seems being incomplete while there's another one in thridparty folder.

To Reproduce

  1. Build from source
  2. Current master branch
  3. CUDA 10
  4. Ubuntu 16.04

Expected behavior

[ 76%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/contrib/gloo/allreduce_ops_gpu.cc.o

Additional context

header file not found
pytorch/caffe2/contrib/gloo/allreduce_ops_gpu.cc:6:39: fatal error: gloo/cuda_allreduce_bcube.h

body:
## 🐛 Failed compiling of the current master branch

So, which gloo should we use? The one in caffe2 seems being incomplete while there's another one in thridparty folder.

## To Reproduce
1. Build from source
1. Current master branch
1. CUDA 10
1. Ubuntu 16.04

## Expected behavior

[ 76%] Building CXX object caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/contrib/gloo/allreduce_ops_gpu.cc.o


## Additional context
```
header file not found
pytorch/caffe2/contrib/gloo/allreduce_ops_gpu.cc:6:39: fatal error: gloo/cuda_allreduce_bcube.h
```
